title: Talk Fragment Event
description: Schema for a single `talk:fragment` event in the `mill-talk` streaming protocol. This schema validates the shape of one stream event only. Event ordering and stream completeness (begin → fragments → end) are enforced by the runtime state machine.

event.description: Identifies this event as a continuation fragment within an active talk stream.

content.description: Markdown-formatted text fragment. This field contains only user-visible content and must not include protocol markers or control information.
